comments: The following sequences all appear to have the same parity (with an extra zero term at the start of A010051): A010051, A061007, A035026, A069754, A071574. - _Jeremy Gardiner_, Aug 09 2002
formula: a(4) = 2, a(p) = 1 for p prime, a(n) = 0 otherwise. Apart from n = 4, a(n) = A010051(n) = A061006(n)/(n-1).
